title: Heraldic armour (Treasure Trails)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Heraldic armours are cosmetic armour rewards from Easy to Hard Treasure Trails. Heraldic armour come in black, adamant, and rune varieties. The armour set only includes a helmet and a shield, whose stats are equivalent to a full helm and kiteshield of the same metal. There are five different heraldic designs in total.

content:
This article is about Treasure Trails reward. For the player owned house painted armour, see Painted heraldic armour.

Heraldic armours are cosmetic armour rewards from Easy to Hard Treasure Trails. Heraldic armour come in black, adamant, and rune varieties. The armour set only includes a helmet and a shield, whose stats are equivalent to a full helm and kiteshield of the same metal. There are five different heraldic designs in total.

Contents

  • 1 Helm
    • 1.1 Black
    • 1.2 Adamant
    • 1.3 Rune
  • 2 Platebody
    • 2.1 Black
    • 2.2 Adamant
    • 2.3 Rune
  • 3 Shield
    • 3.1 Black
    • 3.2 Adamant
    • 3.3 Rune
  • 4 See also
